website_summaries.verdict: The wireless Altec Lansing Waterproof In-Ear Earbuds don't deliver sonic excellence, but for $30, you get a lot for your money.

customer_reviews.title: Music cuts out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pair with phone for music when riding bike. Audio keeps cutting out even with distance less than 4 ft. Phone pairs fine with car and other external speaker. Also, when song paused, it often starts from beginning when resumed, This does not happen when same phone used with wired earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bright

customer_reviews.title: Decent buds
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. pros- awesome battery life 10 to 12 hours. Decent sound quality cons- transitioning to this type of in ear headphone is hard. I used refular ear buds before and it took some time to fet used to. Mine eventually broke on my Appalachian Trail Thru-Hike. Called them and they gve me new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giamo

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones and I took very delicate care of them, always keeping them in a safe pocket of my purse. I never dropped them or got them wet. Suddenly in mid--use, the left ear bud stopped working. I know it's the wiring because if I hold it a certain way, I can hear sound through both buds. I've only had these for 5 months. I want to exchange these but cannot find a phone number or email to call.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daily commute mate
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Battery life is very good. Connects to my phone very easily, without any glitch. Sound quality is not the top quality but I think it is great for this price. Range is also very good compared to other bluetooth devices that I had used.
customer_reviews.author: kkose

customer_reviews.title: Not whats advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good but not what was advertised. Color nit the same and i bout these to replace an identicle pair bought from a major store and when they connect to bluetooth it doesn't tell you in earbuds and also doesnt ask if you want to answer or decline call. It only beeps for a call. So something is off about these but they work and sound decent and battery lasts almost as long as the original pair i bought.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product except for the fact that the dongle must be clipped to a hat or t-shirt to keep it from pulling the earbuds out. Otherwisw very good. Sound could be better.
customer_reviews.author: RAVEN

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I listen to my audible books
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I listen to my audible books. Lasts 20 hours. Can wear it in the shower. Can stop and start without needing to handle the kindle while driving or doing chores. Wish it had a "back up" capability if I miss something. Fair range, maybe 30-40 feet if no obstruction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... headphones and I finally got them and arrived exactly like they were promised and he’s in love with them ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived just in time Today is my husbands birthday and ever since Christmas and my birthday when he bought me the everything proof speaker he’s been wanting the headphones and I finally got them and arrived exactly like they were promised and he’s in love with them Hasn’t put them down since he opened them Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla ayars

customer_reviews.title: Dog yourself a favor and buy these
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The bass is amazing, no tinny sound light weight and the battery while big is light and provides balance. I bought my wife a pair and had to get myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Writer 77

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time I used them !
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones before and LOVED THEM!But the ones I just bought broke the first time I wore them the o e headphone pulled out of the volume control and one of the wires looked like it was barley even soldered....wow NOT HAPPY!I LOVE these ones but dang wtf they must make them really crappy now!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas d.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality though but should not be advertised for ...
customer_reviews.text: The middle controller piece and back cylinder piece cause the earbuds to be too heavy for working out where you're jumping/running/sprinting. Good sound quality though but should not be advertised for the active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: enycel

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again battery is great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've owned many pairs of earbuds and most batteries suck. This battery does last for the 20 hrs it claims. The only reason I gave 4 /5 is the battery is bigger and may annoy some. Also careful when removing buds from your ears as the bud may occasionally fall off and be difficult to find a black bud on a black gym floor.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Ear tips kept coming off even after trying all the spares that came with it. Lasted a year and now one side stopped working. Not ideal for working out. Battery is too bulky and bounces around when doing vigorous exercise. Sound quality is ok. Battery life is surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: daniel colomba

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They talk to you and tell you if they are on and off. They are easy to pair and stay paired to your phone. I have never lost signal while out for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: pgrtennis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The headphones received were a different model than the picture. Also, the earpiece broke after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella Boy

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like I can keep from losing the rubber attachments for ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I can keep from losing the rubber attachments for the earbuds. Never seem to be able to keep earbuds in securely and when do I don't feel like they have enough bass for my liking!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest A.

customer_reviews.title: Range suck
customer_reviews.text: The Range quality on these things suck. I will have my phone in my back pocket and it skip in and out
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas VerHulst

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super blue tooth great sound and long battery life, only that the cusions keep fallig off.
customer_reviews.author: EMETERIO RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a Christmas gift and it has quit working after 4 months. Need warranty information. . .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These earphones worked great..
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. These earphones worked great...until they stopped working at all! They suddenly died, and there was no reviving them. After only 12 weeks of use - maybe 5 hours a week - they just died. No charge. No nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The battery is awful, I have to charge it everytime.
customer_reviews.author: WEN ZHI QIANG

customer_reviews.title: Love music and love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I just love, love, love these headphones. They sound great and stay in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: KOP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These things suck I charged them for a good 6 to 7 hours after buying them on Friday they arrived yesterday and I wanted to put them to the test to see how good they worked the instructions said to charger them until a blue light appeared to let you know that they were fully charged but that never happened all I got while they were still on the charger was a blinking red light and once I took them off the charger and tried to turn them on nothing not a sound at all I would like either an exchange or my money back
customer_reviews.author: Al Porter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few weeks- too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pictures deceiving, defect item
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived dead, only turns on when it's connected to a socket even after hours of charging. It sounded really nice when it did work though. The pictures are deceiving, it looks like the soft parts are semi transparrent and teal in color. It isn't any of those things, it's opaque rubber and a hideous blue. Unfortunate buy.
customer_reviews.author: I.B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! They have no range
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! They have no range. Might as well have my phone in my back pocket, and if I wanted that I wouldn't need Bluetooth headphones!!! Bought them for work for $40 and ended up giving them away and stuck with my old ones. Big waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: KACEY

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: While it does have a long battery life, the long battery cell makes the overall design cumbersome. It would get caught on either side of my neck and pull the earhooks out of my ears and the earbuds wouldn't stay on the earpieces and would easily fall off. Also don't like that the charging port cover isn't attached. I sent these back and would not recommend them at all.
customer_reviews.author: TreBuddha

customer_reviews.title: It's crap
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE. They cut out easily between phone and pocket. Also the earbuds will slip out into your ear, even if you clean your ears often. Sounds quality is also bad. All I have heard from these are mid range. not much base and terrible treble. I bought 2 pairs in case one was faulty. Both did the same. Both were ordered from different stores. Just get some Creative WP-250s. The are far superior.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great for music, horrible for phonecalls!!
customer_reviews.text: Great to hear music... and water-proof feature, but lousy to make phone calls. People cannot hear me and when they do, they say they hear me too far. I tested the sound for two days with both of my phones Samsung and Iphone, the sound was great with music and video but horrible connection for phone calls right next to the phones. Too bad...
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: I only got to enjoy the headset twice
customer_reviews.text: I only got to enjoy the headset twice. I have tried to call the manufacture to get a warranty replacement and all they tell me to do is to charge it with my computer. I plug tgem in to charge and i get a flashing red light. I have left them to charge overnight and still not chrging. Anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing cheap Bluetooth earphones. They are a steal for what they are. These are worth the price and offer very good at listening experience. The fins actually help keep the earpiece in place. The fins do come out though so that is why I left 4 stars. A good pair of Bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.author: ruben Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy battery hanging all the time, mic is poor. Decent for music.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound from these earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I personally can have them in my ears for about 4 hours before I wish they weren't there! I like the volume control and how easy it is to operate. Have not tried the phone answering yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M.

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Only good off you plan on sitting the headphones on top of ypur device. Breaks in and out if ypur device is in your pocket or anywhere else. Can't make calls. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: jami

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds yet.
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds so far..I love the fact that they play for 20 hours without recharging. They are very comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable, bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly comfortable in-ear. I'm pleased with the sound quality, considering they are bluetooth, so I expect a little loss of bass - the bass is discernable and overall music sounds great. They seem to really cancel all outside noise too. Can't wait to wear them on a plane! The controls are up a little higher than I'm used to (compared to apple earbuds), but easy to use. It paired easily and quickly with my phone. Definitely worth paying a little extra for a bit better quality bluetooth earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: btagsTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pair, one lasted about 8 months before the left earbud went, a month after that they just wouldn't turn on anymore. The second pair I bought in September 2017, lost hearing in the left earbud after two months, and less than 3 months later, they just wouldn't stay on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Not so good. The silicon covers fall off the ear phones ...
customer_reviews.text: Not so good. The silicon covers fall off the ear phones and the on/off controls are very touchy and difficult to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dornan

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless earbuds I've owned..
customer_reviews.text: I love these buds. I use them at work and the battery lasts days between charges. So much better than any of my other wireless earbuds. I find the ear piece uncomfortable and it makes my ear sore due to extended use. So I removed the extra part that helps secure it into your ear. And since then I've had no comfort issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Impresive.
customer_reviews.text: Update: one of the earbuds stops working. I think is something related to te cable that makes a false contact. If I push the cable it begins to work. A shame that they lasted so little. I was happy with them. Used only for commuting, twice a day. I will try another manufacturer... I like it. It works as described. Pros: outstanding battery life. I lasts almost a week using it 2 times a day 1 hr. each time. Cons: some pauses on the audio when used in open space and with my cell phone in my pants pocket. Anyway i will recommend it. Excellen seller. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: tongas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even come with the headphones just the box of the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Used this headset 4 times this week at the gym and the left earbud has already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Coe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month - moderate use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones on September 1st, it is now Oct 16th and one of the earbuds has stopped working entirely. I have only had them for a month and some change, I have also noticed other small quality discrepancies, such as wires disconnecting from the main battery, the in line mic barely worked and was of low quality, and the volume control case coming apart. I thought that this should be a high quality product as it was from altec Lansing, but I was wrong. Very displeased, if you're looking for headphones that will last, DO NOT BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!....then they stopped working quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved these. I was even going to buy a second pair for my girlfriend. Loved the ultra long battery life. The problem is that about 5 months in one of the earbuds suddenly stopped working. I take really good care of my headphones and most of mine last at least a year plus. I was disappointed because I feel altec Lansing has a good name.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs Pro

customer_reviews.title: and some unnecessary block that just sits on your neck
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are clunky, I would prefer Bluetooth headphones that are just a wire, this one has a clunky battery/mic, and some unnecessary block that just sits on your neck. It also gets dirty really easily, so if you do buy one of these, don't buy the white ones. The sound on them is not bad, however. I would most likely go for Beats earbuds or Bose, even though there is a significant increase in the price, it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Maruf

product_meta.title: Altec Lansing MZX856-BLK Bluetooth Active Earbuds, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackMake a splash with the Altec Lansing MZX856 Everything Proof In-Ear Sports Earbuds. Offering superior waterproof protection and exceptional audio with a strong 20 hours of battery life, these premium sport earbuds deliver high caliber sound to fit your active lifestyle. These earbuds come fully packaged with 3 sets of Freebit ear tips, a flat tangle-free cable and carry pouch for easy portability while on the go!
feature_bullets: IPX67 Waterproof / everything proof AND IT FLOATS!.Connectivity Technology:Wired/Wireless
20 hours battery life with spoken battery level so the music never fades out
33' wireless range so your music can be heard from farther distances
9mm Neodymium drivers;Onboard microphone and song navigation/telephony buttons
Includes small, medium, and large Freebie ear tips for the ultimate in comfort and secure fit
Includes carry pouch for easy handling convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars176 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
